North Devon is lighting up today with clean 4ft @11s W swell and light SSE winds at 11 mph. Great spots include Porlock Weir and Lynmouth, with the best times to surf at Lynmouth from 08:03 to 16:08. Tomorrow, conditions drop significantly with 8ft @11s W swell and fresh 29 mph WSW winds, making it blown out across the board. The day after, things improve to 5ft @11s WSW with 14 mph SE winds, offering workable waves at spots like Woolacombe and Croyde Beach. Best: today.
